resources:
// Application Browser Changelog Used permissions Access Storage Permission:
• Downloads: save downloads on the sd-card.
• Screenshots: save screenshots of a website on the sd-card.

Access Fine Location:
Some websites (p.e. Google Maps) need this permission to show for example to show you a route to a desired point of interest.

Grant permissions later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> App info\" and choose \"Permissions\". Share screenshot using: Share image using: Share link using: Choose file with: Enter url or search term … Enter search term … Enter title … Searched for: Enabled Disabled Open folder? Location "The website would like to use your current Location." Allow Don\'t allow Bookmarks readLater passStorage History Downloads Web search Confirmation Unknown domain // Menu Items Search Open history Save website Save screenshot Save as bookmark Save to readLater Save to passStorage Share website Share screenshot Share link as text Share link to Clipboard Open download folder Settings Search on site Previous Next Cancel Open passStorage Settings Settings (session) Create shortcut Shortcut created Start search Blank page as favorite Open … More … Reload website Help … all of them Sort entries Sort by title Sort by date Sort by extension Search in titles Search in creation dates Search in URLs Delete list // Context Menu Save link destination Save image Share image Link successfully copied Saving image: Empty tab // Snackbar OK Cancel Never show Downloading file: Do you want to download: Permissions granted? Backup successful. Restore successful. Backup failed. Restore failed. Failed to create screenshot. Please install an app to perform action. Uuups. Wrong password. Do you want to exit? Press back again to exit! Whitelist deleted. Delete whole list? Do you really want to delete the whitelist? Uuups. Something went wrong. Entry already exists. Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. No supported file extension Link received: Confirmation This will overwrite your current backup. Do you really want this? This will overwrite your current database. Do you really want this? Restart app to apply changes? // Bookmarks // ReadLater // Password List item will be removed. OK? Delete entry Adding entry. Successfully set as favorite. You can only choose one favorite. Please disable current. Edit entry Open link: Adding to password list. Username Password Copy username Copy password Title Copy login data Edit login data Today Yesterday Day before yesterday This month Own search Cancel search title date extension // Settings Learn more App settings Enable on start Data Clear on exit Search Here you can configure the look and the behavior of the app. Here you can configure the behavior of the browser on start. Decide which content will be loaded or protect your privacy. These settings are the default ones. And can until you close the app with the help of the \"popup settings\". Mange the application data. Set a password or backup and restore your list entries. This also concerns your privacy. Decide which data will be deleted, when you close the browser. Some settings related to the search functionality of the browser. About Learn more about this app (help, changelog, license, …). App info Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …). Font size Change font size for websites. Backup Backup and restore your bookmarks, the readLater list, the passStorage, your history and your javascript whitelist. A new backup overwrites the old one. Since the passStorage is encrypted with an unique key, this does not work for it. Restore Javascript Some functions on the websites need javascript to work. But javascript is known to be a security risk. Cookies Visited websites are storing their cookies on your device, mostly to improve user experience. For example settings for a search site are stored in cookies. Third party cookies are not from the visited website. Mostly they collect information about your browsing behavior. Clear history on exit Clear your browser history on exit. Search engine Choose your preferred search engine. Wikipedia Choose your preferred language for Wikipedia. Clear cache Clear browser cache on exit. Disable, if you want to use offline functionality. Clear cookies Clear all cookies on exit. Website settings will get lost. Clear form data Clear all form data on exit. All saved form entered data (e.g. mail addresses) will get lost. Form data Save entered form data (e.g mail addresses). Location Allow websites to get your fine location. Load pictures Load pictures on websites. Disable to save data volume and load sites faster. Websites Choose which websites are enabled for the fast search. Choose a site to search DuckDuckGo (DDG) is an Internet search engine that emphasizes protecting searchers\' privacy and avoiding the filter bubble of personalized search results. Flickr is an image hosting and video hosting website and web services suite. GitHub is a web-based Git repository hosting service. Google Search, commonly referred to as Google Web Search or simply Google, is a web search engine developed by Google. Encrypted Google Search, use to override AMP-link loading. MetaGer is a meta search engine focused on protecting users\' privacy. Startpage is a meta search engine based in New York and the Netherlands, which highlights privacy as its distinguishing feature from other internet search engines. Wikipedia is a free online encyclopedia that, by default, allows its users to edit any article. YouTube is an American video-sharing website headquartered in San Bruno, California, United States. App protection Set a pin to protect app against unwanted access. Only use numbers. Let empty, if you do not want to protect the app. Rotation Set the rotation mode of the app: auto, portrait or landscape. Whitelist Clear your javascript whitelist. Fullscreen Hide the status- and/or the toolbar at the bottom while browsing. Block ads Block (not all, but most) unwanted ads while browsing. Request desktop Try to show the desktop site of websites by default. This feature is a little bit buggy. Open links in background Checking this will open links in the background and put a notification on your statusbar to open the link later. Disable to open links immediately. Start tab Which tab should be displayed on app start? Theme Don\'t like green? Change the color! Swipe Swipe left and right to switch tabs. // Intro Skip Let\'s start. Browser Thank you for choosing \"Browser\". It\'s fully open source and still in development. Here\'s a short intro how to use … The lists \"Browser\" is organized in lists: bookmarks, readLater, passStorage and the history. Toolbar Swipe left to open bookmarks, right to open readLater and up to close the app. Long click the toolbar to switch between the tabs. Settings In the settings popup you can configure the behavior of \"Browser\" for the current session. To open the main settings, just click the \"Settings\" button. Help To get more infos how to use \"Browser\" just open the \"help dialog\" in the menu. // About About Developer Used open source libraries Contributors Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). Used to hide the toolbar while scrolling. Used to build the intro screen. Used to en- and decrypt login data saved in the passStore. Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons. A powerful library to display media files for Android. Helped to implement \"adblocking\", the five tabs and \"request desktop site\". Russian translation. Chinese translation. //File chooser Share Rename Delete // Password Pin forgotten? Enter pin Delete all data to reset your app pin?
